page.title: 18Leisure Survey-under 15s
page.content: This survey of 175 pupils from John Beddoes school probed how they spent their leisure time. Presteigne and area offer{no commercial entertainment for under 15s,and{no regular public {transport.}Activities are divided into 21 categories and the frequency of pupils involvement in each noted. Frequently means weekly;often means 2 or 3 times a month;rarely means monthly. {Limits to survey: 1.No count under age drinking has been taken. 2.Peer group pressure prevented many pupils admitting participation in club activities e.g.church Despite limitations the survey provides interesting data about young people's leisure activities in this rural area. (Data p.19 and 20)
